title: How to define parenting, and what skills should a parent develop for making his and her child better and stable - Quora

response.answer_text: Parenting is the process of raising a child from birth- physically, emotionally, socially and intellectually to the adulthood. There are no special skills defined for the parents. All you need to do is to show love and affection towards your child. You should keep few points in mind for good parenting Your child should feel secure with youAppreciate your child whenever possibleIf you want them to respect others then treat them with respect.Let them speak their heart out in front of you. Respect their feelingsBe firm and consistent in reactions.Define boundariesSpend quality timeYou should be available for themBe friendly with them and listen to them carefullyKeep reminding them that you love them unconditionallyHope these tips will be helpful for you :)

That’s a great question Kirtna. Parenting is all about raising a new member of the family, community and society to do good for themselves and the world they have to live in. That takes love, good care and constructive concern, and teaching the child about ownership, responsibility and accountability through the tools of empathy, compassion and resilience.
